metadata.title: CVE-2018-12096 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The liblnk_data_string_get_utf8_string_size function inliblnk_data_string.c in liblnk through 2018-04-19 allows remote attackersto cause an information disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read) via acrafted lnk file. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described inlibyal/liblnk issue 33 on GitHub.

criterions.comment: liblnk package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
